object.name: WebAppData
object.description: Describes data sent from a Web App to the bot.
object.html_description: Describes data sent from a Web App to the bot.
object.rst_description: Describes data sent from a `Web App <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps>`_ to the bot.

annotations.description: The data. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.html_description: The data. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.rst_description: The data. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.name: data

annotations.description: Text of the web_app keyboard button from which the Web App was opened. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.html_description: Text of the web_app keyboard button from which the Web App was opened. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.rst_description: Text of the *web_app* keyboard button from which the Web App was opened. Be aware that a bad client can send arbitrary data in this field.
annotations.name: button_text
